ai-snp4.12:1.1_0: “The group of one who has reached (any) views,
ai-snp4.12:1.2_0: and so many skillful things speak.
ai-snp4.12:1.4_0: This is the way to robb the ascetic.
ai-snp4.12:2.1_0: But even arguing, quarreling, and fighting,
ai-snp4.12:2.2_0: his fool is unskillful and what is unskillful.
ai-snp4.12:2.3_0: who is the truth, what is it?
ai-snp4.12:3.1_0: “If you want to listen to the Dhamma,
ai-snp4.12:3.2_0: is a fool, unfit for wisdom;
ai-snp4.12:3.3_0: all of it is well known to fools.
ai-snp4.12:3.4_0: All these all grounds for views.
ai-snp4.12:4.1_0: They’re not attached to their own views,
ai-snp4.12:4.4_0: because you have seen your consent.
ai-snp4.12:5.4_0: That’s why the fool tames others.”
ai-snp4.12:6.1_0: “It is the only truth, friends, that you are truthful
ai-snp4.12:6.4_0: why do you say the same?”
ai-snp4.12:7.1_0: “What is the truth, does not hard to understand?
ai-snp4.12:7.4_0: That’s why they don’t say that.”
ai-snp4.12:8.1_0: “Why should they say that these things are different?
ai-snp4.12:9.3_0: she wavered, and after gradually she gave up her husband,
ai-snp4.12:10.1_0: in what is seen, heard, or thought.
ai-snp4.12:10.2_0: Relying on these kinds of conceit,
ai-snp4.12:10.3_0: having thus destroyed (them), the Lord of the World,
ai-snp4.12:11.1_0: With that the fool tames others,
ai-snp4.12:11.2_0: Therefore he is skilled in that meaning.
ai-snp4.12:12.1_0: he is far from views, he is mindful.
ai-snp4.12:12.2_0: should fill a dead person with soft conceit,
ai-snp4.12:13.1_0: This is what belongs to another,
ai-snp4.12:13.3_0: Even if the Wise One will have knowledge himself,
ai-snp4.12:13.4_0: there is no danger for anyone who has a fool with wisdom.
ai-snp4.12:14.3_0: he says (thinking): “All-Seeing Worlds’ bodies is simply so.”
ai-snp4.12:14.4_0: Because they have no lust for you,
ai-snp4.12:15.2_0: Nothing is for purity that is purified,
ai-snp4.12:15.3_0: So it is also beaten downwards.
ai-snp4.12:16.2_0: Where does the fool tame others?
ai-snp4.12:16.4_0: the foolish and the purity of the authority,
ai-snp4.12:17.1_0: having deliberated the ground, he himself undergoes himself,
ai-snp4.12:17.4_0: those in the world who don’t love me.”
